description: Feel the beat as wannabe rockstar Chai and his ragtag team fight against evil megacorp with raucous rhythm combat!

0.1.0.description:
See [README](https://github.com/TRPG0/HbkArchipelago/blob/main/README.md) for install instructions.

- Initial release.
0.1.0.title: HbkArchipelago 0.1.0

0.1.1.description:
See [README](https://github.com/TRPG0/HbkArchipelago/blob/main/README.md) for install instructions.

- Temporarily removed a location for talking to SEB-AAA in Track 1, and renamed other Broken Armstrong Circuit locations in Track 1.
- Fixed Track 8: Broken Armstrong Circuit 4 not being checked properly.
- Fixed Arpeggio Stab incorrectly giving Echo Splash to the player instead.
0.1.1.title: HbkArchipelago 0.1.1

0.1.2.description:
See [README](https://github.com/TRPG0/HbkArchipelago/blob/main/README.md) for install instructions.

The Xbox Game Pass version is **not** compatible.

- Now compatible with Update 10!
0.1.2.title: HbkArchipelago 0.1.2

0.2.0.description:
See [README](https://github.com/TRPG0/HbkArchipelago/blob/main/README.md) for install instructions.

Packaged with `zDEV-UE4SS_v3.0.1-848-g91b70e5`, `hibiki-bootstrap-v0.1.1`

This version is not compatible with multiworlds that were generated on version 0.1.2 or lower! If you already have a multiworld in progress, ***do not update*** unter after you are finished playing!

- Added options for randomizing Chai's attacks, Peppermint's attacks, Macaron's attacks, Korsica's attacks, Special Attacks, Items, and Chips in the Store.
- Item descriptions in the store will now tell you what you will get before buying something.
- The combo list in the pause menu now works properly.
- The floating 808 next to Chai during gameplay is now always visible.
- Fixed crashing during track select.
0.2.0.title: HbkArchipelago 0.2.0

0.2.1.description:
See [README](https://github.com/TRPG0/HbkArchipelago/blob/main/README.md) for install instructions.

Packaged with `zDEV-UE4SS_v3.0.1-848-g91b70e5`, `hibiki-bootstrap-v0.2.0`

- Added a new build for the Xbox Store version of the game!
- Added a new `resend` command, which will attempt to resend all previously checked locations to the server. This cannot be undone.
- Significantly increased client polling rate.
- Fixed disconnecting due to a bug during server seed/version check.
- Missing items will now be received again after reloading from a checkpoint during a stage.
0.2.1.title: HbkArchipelago 0.2.1
